mapper.insert: insert into userchat (sender_id, receiver_id, message, sendTime, status) values (#{sender_id}, #{receiver_id}, #{message}, #{sendTime}, #{status})
mapper.update: update userchat set sender_id = #{sender_id}, receiver_id = #{receiver_id}, message = #{message}, sendTime = #{sendTime}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, sender_id, receiver_id, message, sendTime, status from userchat
